europeana:record.dc:title: Revision of the genera of the subfamily Microtypinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera; Braconidae; Microtypinae; Plesiotypus; Neomicrotypus; Microtypus; Neotropical; Pacific; Holarctic
Oriental; keys
europeana:record.dc:description: The genera of the subfamily Microtypinae are revised and two new genera are described and illustrated. Plesiotypus gen. nov. (type species: P. depressus spec. nov.) from India and Neomicrotypus gen. nov. (type species: N. penai spec, nov.) from Chile. Keys to the genera of Microtypinae and to the species of Plesiotypus are added. Plesiotypus fullawayi (Beardsley, 1961) is a new combination.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revision of the genera of the subfamily Microtypinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 66) (Issue 26)
